damoeb/feedless: Middleware to create RSS feeds, filter existing feeds and
item.description: feedless is an experimental feed middleware to create RSS/ATOM/Json feeds of most HTMLs or feeds and manipulate them. It's goal is to keep the web open and accessible and to create shareable data streams. You may Self-host or use feedless.org to create and share feeds.
